segments.text: I see the woman's foot is already in the puddle of water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn't seem to feel it, even though it must be cold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice her dress is just above her knees, almost touching the water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is spreading across the floor, getting closer to the children.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the floor must be getting slippery by now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is still polishing that plate, completely unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the dishes stacked neatly beside her, ready to be put away.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is reflecting the light from the window, making little ripples.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how long it will take for her to notice the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is getting ridiculous, someone could get hurt!
segments.speaker: PAR
